hero_section.title: Transform Your Space with Elegant Pergolas
hero_section.subtitle: Welcome to Istanbul Aluminum, where we specialize in high-quality aluminum pergolas designed to enhance your outdoor living experience. Explore our stunning designs and discover how we can bring your vision to life

content.text: Our aluminum is engineered for durability and elegance, ensuring long-lasting performance in any environment.
Choose our products for their strength, lightweight design, and resistance to corrosion, making them ideal for your next project.

content.title: Custom Pergola Design
content.text: Tailored designs to fit your unique outdoor space and style.

content.title: High-Quality Materials
content.text: We use premium aluminum to ensure longevity and aesthetic appeal.

content.title: Expert Consultation
content.text: Our team provides professional advice to help you choose the perfect pergola solution.

footer.content: Wel sell pergolas, provide 3D service for our customers, and we ship to all countries worldwide.
footer.address_content: Mecidiye Mah. Ağrı Cad. No:120 Sultanbeyli - İstanbul / Türkiye
